roleset.name: go-light

roles.note: If anyone sees ANY more instances of this verb construction, please send them in. Particularly if they contain additional args that look like they should be #ed.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls.

example.name: The 1 instance
example.text: They-1 were attempting *PRO*-1 to go - light and were using our FMFM's to teach em techniques .
example.note: This is the only example we have been able to find for this. The context is military in nature, with FMFM's possibly referring to Fleet Marine Force Manuals. It's not clear whether 'em' is an acronym or abbreviated " 'em" for 'them'. If anyone has any inside info on this, let us know.
